content:
Alright, these ones you've submitted
are in pretty good condition.
For the remaining ones, keep up the good work!

I'll take you to find her,
Just follow me closely!
You're amazing! Taking on such daunting tasks with such dedication - your future is definitely going to be bright and shining!

You haven't given me enough yet.
Need more time to think about it?
I'm a reasonable person, take your time.

You're great, I like diligent people like you,
So I've decided to introduce you to a friend,
my twin sister - Moonhead.
Now, show me what you've picked up.
